content: प्रौ(प्रो)ढिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Full growth or development, maturity, perfection. {@--2@} Growth, increase. {@--3@} Greatness, grandeur, elevation, dignity; <ls>Vikr. 1. 15.</ls> {@--4@} Boldness, audacity. {@--5@} Pride, arrogance, self-confidence. {@--6@} Controversy, discussion. {@--7@} Zeal, exertion, enterprize.
